ComicInfo.Summary:
The Savage Avengers assemble! Wolverine, Conan, Dr. Strange, Elektra, Black Widow, Hellstrom, Voodoo, Magik...and more. The heroes draw up a battle plan against Kulan Gath, and you'll be thrilled as Conan wields a most unexpected weapon in the fight against darkness.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------|---------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Valerio Giangiordano & Frank D'Armata | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover | BossLogic | 2 |
ComicInfo.Tags: Shuma-Gorath,Doctor Strange,Kulan Gath,Savage Avengers,Black Widow,Storm,Doctor Voodoo,Elektra,Captain America,The Moon,Hellstorm,Conan,Bats,Professor X,Wolverine,Magik
ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Thirteen: Bang, Right to the Moon
